description: This is the schema the declarative module definition (in JSON format) must adhere to. The Apollo audit check validates all module JSON files against this schema. For explanation of the keywords of this schema, please visit https://ajv.js.org/keywords.html

siteDir.description: site directory path for base site file

techScoreboardURL.description: only valid for the type 'repo' , used to reference 3rd party approvals

srcDir.description: source directory path for module file

testDir.description: test directory path for module file

version.description: only valid for the type 'repo' , used to indicate 3rd party version

pathOffset.description: Path offset relative to the site assets directory.

jars.description: Array of the  3rd party jar dependancy on the module

npmPaths.description: Array of the  npm modules in the solution

showcaseFiles.description: Contribution to showcase. Additional files required to support this module in the showcase

sonarCoverageExclusions.description: Array of file patterns to be excluded from SonarQube coverage processing

sonarExclusions.description: Array of file patterns to be excluded from SonarQube processing

type.description: Array of file patterns to be excluded from SonarQube processing

excludeFromAuditDeps.description: if value is true then it will not check the audit for the module

karmaInclude.description: It used to indicate that module should be included in the Karma setup assets directory

skipAudit.description: if value is true then this module will be exempt from the audit for the module

skipJSDoc.description: if value is true then this module will be exempt from check the JS Doc for the module

skipTest.description: if value is true then this module will be exempt from check the test for the module

themeExtensions.description: Array of consumer provided theme (.scss) files extending AFX's theme files. For supporting modular-theme-extensions.
